thread.title: Naomi Campbell denies she's feuding with Rihanna after pair unfollow each other on Instagram
thread.title_full: Naomi Campbell denies she's feuding with Rihanna after pair unfollow each other on Instagram

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Naomi Campbell denies she's feuding with Rihanna after pair unfollow each other on Instagram
text:
Naomi Campbell denies she's feuding with Rihanna after pair unfollow each other on Instagram Andy Cohen quizzed the supermodel on his chat show this week   Naomi Campbell insists there's no beef between her and Rihanna     
Naomi Campbell has denied she's fallen out with Rihanna. 
The supermodel model and singer, who were thought to be good friends, sparked rumours of a feud when they both stopped following each other on Instagram recently. 
But Naomi, 46, insisted "everything's fine" when she appeared on Watch What Happens Live on Tuesday night. 
Host Andy Cohen didn't waste much time before asking the beauty what had happened between them. 
"It seems like Naomi Campbell and Rihanna unfollowed each other on Instagram... is everything OK between them?" Andy said, reading out a fan-submitted question. Rihanna and Naomi Campbell Naomi Campbell (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
"Everything's fine," she replied with a wry smile. "Of course it's fine." 
But Andy didn't seem entirely convinced with her answer, and Naomi appeared to fuel his doubt when she quipped, "I'm an actress now, Andy." Rihanna (L) and Naomi Campbell attend the FENTY PUMA by Rihanna AW16 Collection (Photo: Getty Images) Naomi Campbell (Photo: Rex Features) 
"I'm trying to think what the beef could be about?" Andy then asked. 
But Naomi shut him down, insisting: "I don't have beef. I don't have beef especially with black women who I think are powerful and there, and we're all doing the same thing - doing the same struggle."
